Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1970...
Had first career hit on 5/24/1973, off Dick Joyce (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/16/1973, off Jim O'Toole (CIN)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Cincinnati on 9/11/1978...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/7/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $6,500,000 per year...
Injured on 8/10/1980 with a Broken Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1981, hitting .556 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
